content: **knitted bib/shawl for babies in drops fabel the piece is worked top down with garter stitch sizes 0 to 4 years ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fa-043-by yarn group a ----------------------------------------------------------- **size** one-size width 56 cm height 18 cm **yarn** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 921 unicorn party **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm 60 cm **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 48 row in height with garter stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
